instruction: Generate a thank you message for a kind gesture.
input: My colleague stayed late on a Friday evening to help me out with a presentation.
output: I just want to express my deepest gratitude for my colleague who stayed late on a Friday evening to help me out with a presentation. Your kind gesture did not go unnoticed and I cannot express enough how thankful I am. You truly helped me in my time of need and I truly appreciate it. Thank you!
